name: Scrolls (Mconnorconcepts)
description:
Scrolls is a VR resource management/ wave survival game.

This Project was made for the 2022 VR game jam. The concept for the game is based on the D&D spell scrolls. you only have once shot to use you spell so don't mess it up.

How to play:  Scavenge your wizard workshop to create spell scrolls. At your workstation combine potions and empty rolled up scroll. This will create your scroll. Place it in your bag of holding and save it for later. After time runs up (2 minutes) you will be transported to the dungeon where you will fight off endless numbers of skeletons. look at you left hand to check the scrolls remaining. use the a button to switch scrolls and trigger to use it. Not all spells work the same experiment to see what works best for you.

Developed for Quest 2

(future updates planed)

Known Bugs - 

- occasionally the scrolls wont get deleted when combined with potion
